Comments_List: Methods for reading and analyzing literary works and finding connections between them

The materials covered were in depth with great discussions. Nevertheless, I sometimes felt like we spent too much time on one material while we could have included more or discussed the other assignments at an equal depth.
Yes!! Its a great class- the literature is all really interesting, and while the course doesnt center around colonialism in America, I am glad that we spent a few weeks on it
Absolutely, it was a fantastic course with a good selection of literary works that are essential to understand not only the start of globalism in the Renaissance but also to understand our own world.
